description.name: Scope of the process landscape
description.data:
The following processes are in the scope of this process landscape:

  1. MAN.3 Project Management
  2. SUP.8 Configuration Management
  3. SWE.1 Software Requirements Analysis
  4. SUP.1 Quality Assurance
  5. SYS.2 System Requirements Analysis
  6. 12313232

description.name: Process landscape diagram
description.data: The process landscape diagram is shown below:

description.name: Process performance objectives
description.data: The process performance objectives are defined and monitored to ensure the effective application of the process in the scope of the product development. The performance objectives can be either qualitative or quantitative. At a minimum, they should cover the following:

subitem.name: Requirements for the project activities to fulfil the purpose of the process such as
subitem.data:
• Effort: the completion of the project within the estimated efforts.
  • Resources usage including human and infrastructure: the completion of the project within the estimated resources.
  • Schedule: on-time completion of the planned milestones without any delay which is not agreed with the customer.
  • Key Performance Indicators (KPIs): measure and achieve the KPIs described in the standard process.
  • Process cycle time and frequency: the iteration cycle for the product and the process shall be according to the defined work packages and the project management methods used such as Scrum.

subitem.name: Requirements for the project activities to fulfil the purpose of the process such as
subitem.data:
• Compliance with internal standards: Adherence to standard or process which is applicable to project or organization
  • Compliances to customer standards, norms, laws, etc.: adherence to any customer-specific standards
  • 12131323131

subitem.name: Consideration of stakeholder requirements
subitem.data: • Adherence to any stakeholder-specific standards, processes, etc

description.name: Tailoring Guidelines
description.data: No tailoring is allowed on this process page.
